title: Why are the pimples in my face appearing in a straight line? - Quora

response.answer_text: Acne can appear in any form, and while it is unusual to have acne appear straight line, there could be a few conditions that are causing you to have this type of eruption: 1) Allergic reaction 2) Discoid eczema: which can cause round red patches of inflamed skin. 3) Bed bugs 4) Scabies 5) Shingles Honestly, it is hard to determine what you may have without a proper examination. Please contact a dermatologist as they can help you. Hope this helps :-)
